sense.gloss: method, process, manner, way, means, technique
corporation, corporate body, company, legal entity, legal person, juridical person
laws and ordinances, acts (of parliament, congress, etc.)
legal profession, judicial officer, lawyer, attorney

sdata.j: やる↑気↑↓き↓があれば↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓は↑見↑↓み↓つかるもの。
sdata.e: Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.e: There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.
